Actions.Action:
from widget_header import WidgetHeader
goal = request.arguments['itemid'].lower() url = WidgetHeader(self).get_app_url(goal) self.action("goTo", url)

try: from class_macro import Macros from ProSuiteMacrosListWidget import ProSuiteMacrosListWidget from utilities import current_page_name def invoke_dispather(macros): from VEE_dispatcher import InvokeDispatcher try: from VEE_models import get_current_page except: from VEE_std_lib import v_currentpage get_current_page = lambda page_name: { "*": v_currentpage(), }.get(page_name, v_currentpage())
invoke_disp = InvokeDispatcher() invoke_disp.page = self invoke_disp.growl = self.growl invoke_disp.xmldialog = self.xmldialog invoke_disp.macros = macros current_page = get_current_page(current_page_name(e2vdom=True)) invoke_disp.current_page = current_page invoke_disp.run() #self.growl.action("show", ["Info", "Macro run complete"])
macros_id = None
#click on macros\plugiuns panel object_guid = request.arguments.get("id") \ or request.arguments.get("itemid") \ or "m_{}".format(request.arguments.get("macros_id")) if object_guid: if object_guid.find("_", 0) == 1: #parse guid prefix, object_guid = object_guid.split("_", 1) #check prefix value if prefix == "p": #it is plugin guid widget_macro_table = ProSuiteMacrosListWidget(self, object_guid) widget_macro_table.render() elif prefix <> "m": raise Exception("no macro") elif prefix == "m": self.xmldialog.action("hide", []) self.plugin_panel.plugin_panel_dialog.action('hide') self.plugin_panel.action('toggleClass', 'hidden') if object_guid: macros = Macros.get_by_guid(object_guid) invoke_dispather(macros) self.plugin_panel.action('addClass', 'hidden') except Exception, ex: self.growl.action("show", ["Error", str(ex)]) from vdom_debug import exception_trace raise

from prosuite_settings import settings
url = settings.header_buttons.get(request.arguments['itemid'], "#")
self.action("goTo", url['link'] if url != "#" else url)

from widget_header import WidgetHeader from auth_config import check_current_user
check_current_user() WidgetHeader(self).render()

from widget_header import WidgetHeader
WidgetHeader(self).render_plugin_macroses()

Actions.Action: from prosuite_settings import settings self.text1.classname += settings.login_params['class_logo'] self.text1.value = """ {}""".format(settings.product_list[application.id][1])

from class_errors import get_error_by_code from prosuite_settings import settings
error_code = request.arguments.get("code") title, text = get_error_by_code(error_code)
self.title = settings.localization["page_title"].format(page_name=title, app_name=application.name) self.error_name.value = u"{0} {1}".format(title, error_code or "") self.error_message.value = text

from VEE_resources import ResourceFolderManager, TemporaryFolderManager import mimetypes from prosuite_localization import get_localization import uuid from class_plugins import Plugins from ProAdmin import current_user from class_macro import Macros
lang = get_localization()
def is_uuid(s): r = True try: uuid.UUID(s) except Exception: r = False return r
try: plugin_guid = request.arguments["guid"] name = request.arguments["name"] type = request.arguments["type"] res_manager = ResourceFolderManager if type == "res" else TemporaryFolderManager
if type == "macros": result = "" if current_user(): result = Macros.get_by_guid(plugin_guid).code else: response.redirect("/login") response.binary = True response.write((result or " ").encode("utf8"))
res_manager = res_manager(plugin_guid)
# migrate from old style storing pictures if name and is_uuid(name): plugin = Plugins.get_by_guid(plugin_guid) macroses = plugin.get_macros() file_exist = application.storage.exists(name) new_name = name + ".png" if file_exist else None if plugin.picture == name: plugin.picture = new_name plugin.save() if file_exist: res_manager.import_res(new_name, application.storage.open(name)) name = new_name application.storage.delete(name) for m in macroses: if m.macros_picture == name: m.macros_picture = new_name m.save()
if res_manager.exists(name): content_type = mimetypes.guess_type(name, strict=False)[0] response.send_file(name, res_manager.size(name), res_manager.open(name), content_type=content_type) else: response.terminate() except Exception, ex: self.growl.title = lang["error"] self.growl.text = lang["unknown_error"] self.growl.active = "1"

        <Attribute Name="htmlcode"><![CDATA[<style>


/**************************************************
GENERAL
***************************************************/

.filesharing div{
		font-family: 'Montserrat' !important;
    letter-spacing: 0.03em;
    font-weight: 600 !important;
    outline: 0;
	}


.filesharing{
width: 100% !important;
    height: 100% !important;
	display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
	overflow:hidden !important;
}
.filesharing::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 7px;
}

.filesharing::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background-color: #DDE6EE;
}

.filesharing::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #454954;
  outline: 1px solid slategrey;
}


/**************************************************
HEADER
***************************************************/

.filesharing .header{
	 -moz-user-select: none;
        -webkit-user-select: none;
        -ms-user-select: none;
        user-select: none;

display: flex;
align-items: center;
width: 100% !important;
position: relative !important;
}

.filesharing .logo{
	flex-shrink: 0;

position: static !important;
    height: 54px !important;
    width: 168px !important;
    background-position: center !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    margin: -9px 40px 0px 20px;
}
.filesharing .menubtn{
	flex-shrink: 0;

position: static !important;
    display: inline !important;
    width: initial !important;
    height: auto !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    left: 0px !important;
    top: 0px !important;
padding-left: 38px;
box-sizing: border-box;
margin-right: 39px;
	opacity:0.9;
	cursor:pointer;
	padding-top: 8px;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    background-position: 0px center;
}
.filesharing .menubtn:hover{
	opacity:1;
}
.filesharing .menubtn .label{
font-weight: 600 !important;
    font-size: 14px !important;
    line-height: 17px !important;
    letter-spacing: 0.02em;
    color: #9167DB !important;
    position: static !important;
    display: inline;
    width: initial !important;
    height: auto !important;
	font-family: 'Montserrat' !important;
    letter-spacing: 0.03em;
    font-weight: 700 !important;
    outline: 0;
}
/**************************************************
CONTENT
***************************************************/


.filesharing .content{
position: relative !important;
width: 100% !important;
height: 100% !important;
top:0px !important;
left:0px !important;

}
.filesharing .content::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 7px;
}

.filesharing .content::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background-color: #DDE6EE;
}

.filesharing .content::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #454954;
  outline: 1px solid slategrey;
}

/**************************************************
PANEL
***************************************************/

.filesharing .folders_panel, .filesharing .history_panel{

width: 100% !important;
    height: 36px !important;
    position: relative !important;
    top: 0px !important;
    left: 0px !important;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding-left: 44px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none;
    position: sticky !important;
    top: 0px !important;
    background: white;
    z-index: 10;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;

}
.filesharing .folders_panel .title, .filesharing .history_panel .title{
    display: inline !important;
    width: initial !important;
    position: static !important;
    font-weight: 700 !important;
    font-size: 18px !important;
    line-height: 22px !important;
    color: #474754 !important;
    margin-right: 29px;
}
.filesharing .folders_panel .edit_folders, .filesharing .history_panel .edit_history{
    display: inline !important;
    width: initial !important;
    position: static !important;
	display: inline !important;
    width: initial !important;
    position: static !important;
    font-size: 14px !important;
    line-height: 17px !important;
    letter-spacing: 0.02em;
    color: #9167DB !important;
	opacity:0.9;
	cursor:pointer;
}
.filesharing .edit_folders:hover, .filesharing .edit_history:hover{
opacity:1;

}

.filesharing .folders_panel .icon_expand, .filesharing .history_panel .icon_expand {
position: static !important;
    Width: 25px !important;
    height: 25px !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
    margin-right: 10px;

	-webkit-transform: rotateZ(-90deg);
	-moz-transform: rotateZ(-90deg);
	-o-transform: rotateZ(-90deg);
	transform: rotateZ(-90deg);
cursor:pointer;
	}

.filesharing .folders_panel.expanded .icon_expand, .filesharing .history_panel.expanded .icon_expand{
	-webkit-transform: rotateZ(0deg);
	-moz-transform: rotateZ(0deg);
	-o-transform: rotateZ(0deg);

from vdom_debug import r,p from engine.exceptions import RenderTermination
def main(): try: s = "100000" f = open("/var/vdom/server.log", "r") f.seek(int('-'+s), 2) p(f.read()) except RenderTermination: pass except Exception as e: p(e) debug(str(e)) raise
main()

from config import config from proadmin_sso import ClientLoginHelper from VEE_core import engine # only for Engine initialization from prosuite_localization import get_localization import ProAdmin from prosuite_settings import settings from AppinmailSSO import AppinmailSSO
ProAdmin.current_host = request.server.host.lower() lang = get_localization() login_params = settings.login_params auto_aim = True self.dialog_aim_login.appinmail_iframe.htmlcode = "" dialog_login_button_lable = "Login with Appinmail"
if settings.system["debug"]: class Fake(object): def __init__(self): self.arguments = {} fake = Fake() # copy requiest arguments for key in request.arguments.keys(): fake.arguments[key] = request.arguments.get(key) fake.arguments['login'] = 'root' fake.arguments['password'] = 'root' request = fake
if "version" in config and config["version"]: self.dialog_login.text_version.value = "v. " + config["version"]
if "not_auto_login_aim" in request.arguments: AppinmailSSO.logoff() auto_aim = False
session["embeded"] = True if "embeded" in request.arguments else False
# ----------------------------------------------------------------- # LOGIN # -----------------------------------------------------------------
login_helper = ClientLoginHelper(request, response, settings.pages["home"])
try: login_helper.login_by_token()
login_helper.login_by_proadmin()
login_helper.login_by_appinmail(auto_aim)
login_helper.login_by_password()
except ProAdmin.ProAdminEmptyPasswordError, ex: self.growl.title = lang["error.title"] self.growl.text = lang["login.password_emplty_error"] self.growl.active = "1"
except ProAdmin.ProAdminEmptyLoginError, ex: self.growl.title = lang["error.title"] self.growl.text = lang["login.login_emplty_error"] self.growl.active = "1"
except ProAdmin.ProAdminLoginError, ex: self.growl.title = lang["error.title"] self.growl.text = lang["login.invalid_login_passwd_error"] self.growl.active = "1"
if ProAdmin.application().has_users_attached_to_appinmail(): AppinmailSSO.try_authorize("https://admin.appinmail.io") user = AppinmailSSO.current_user() if user: if user.get("last_name") and user.get("first_name"): user_info = u"{} {}".format(user.get("last_name"), user.get("first_name")) # slice too long name if len(user_info) > 21: user_info = u"{} {}.".format(user.get("last_name"), user.get("first_name")[0]) if len(user_info) > 21: user_info = u"{}. {}.".format(user.get("last_name")[0], user.get("first_name")[0]) else: user_info = user["short_login"]
dialog_login_button_lable = u"Login as {}".format(user_info)
# ----------------------------------------------------------------- # LOCALIZATION # ----------------------------------------------------------------- self.title = settings.localization["page_title"].format(page_name=lang["login.title"], app_name=application.name) self.dialog_login.classname += login_params["class_logo"] self.dialog_login.form_login.text_login.value = lang["login.login.label"] self.dialog_login.form_login.text_password.value = lang["login.password.label"] self.dialog_login.form_login.signin_button.label = lang["login.signin_button.label"] self.dialog_login.slogan.value = lang[login_params["slogan"]] self.dialog_login.form_login.appinmail_login.text = dialog_login_button_lable

if "ln" in request.arguments: lang = request.arguments.get("ln") switch_lang(lang) response.cookies["language"] = lang response.cookies["language"]["max-age"] = str(60*60*24*365)

login_path = '/login?' if back_url: login_path = '/login?back_url={}&'.format(back_url) del session['back_url']
# local scheme url = login_path
# remote scheme if ProAdmin.scheme().is_remote(): app_host = SSOUrl.current_protocol() + '://' + SSOUrl.current_host()
url = SSOUrl.proadmin_url('/logoff') url.cont_url = app_host + login_path url = url.build()

from class_macro import Macros from class_timer import Timer from class_custom_event import CustomEvent from class_plugins import Plugins from VEE_events import event_map import re from widget_user_group_dialog import authenticated, error_handler, administrator, set_vdom_container from widget_error_handler import handle_errors from widget_plugin_details import PluginDetailsWidget
set_vdom_container(self)
@authenticated @administrator @error_handler def main(): try: name = request.arguments.get("formtext_name", "") macros_type = request.arguments.get("formlist_type", Macros.MacrosType.LIBRARY) event = request.arguments.get("formlist_event", "") location = request.arguments.get("formlist_location", "") description = request.arguments.get("formtextarea_description", "") macros_id = request.arguments.get("formtext_id", "") page = request.arguments.get("formlist_page", "") plugin_id = request.shared_variables["plugin_id"] plugin = Plugins.get_by_id(plugin_id) guid_regex = re.compile("^[a-zA-Z0-9]{8}\-[a-zA-Z0-9]{4}\-[a-zA-Z0-9]{4}\-[a-zA-Z0-9]{4}\-[a-zA-Z0-9]{12}$") class_name = "" timer_guid = "" custom_event_guid = "" is_button = "0" on_board = "0"
if macros_type == Macros.MacrosType.EVENT: is_button = "0" if guid_regex.match(event): if Timer.get_timer_by_guid(event): timer_guid = event class_name = "VEE_TimerEvent" elif CustomEvent.get_custom_event_by_guid(event): custom_event_guid = event class_name = "VEE_CustomEvent" else: for e in event_map: if e == int(event): class_name = event_map[e].__name__
elif macros_type == Macros.MacrosType.BUTTON: is_button = "1" on_board = "1" if location and location == "1" else "0"
elif macros_type != Macros.MacrosType.LIBRARY: macros_type = Macros.MacrosType.LIBRARY
macros = Macros.get_by_id(macros_id) if macros_id else Macros() macros.name = name macros.class_name = class_name macros.timer_guid = timer_guid macros.custom_event_guid = custom_event_guid macros.is_button_macros = is_button macros.on_board = on_board # self.action("consoleMessage", [on_board]) macros.description = description macros.plugin_guid = plugin.guid macros.page = page macros.type = macros_type macros.save()
PluginDetailsWidget(self, plugin).render_macros_datatable() self.dialog_create_macro.action("hide")
except RuntimeError, ex: handle_errors(self.growl)
main()
request.shared_variables['plugin_id']

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*- from widget_user_group_dialog import authenticated, error_handler, administrator, set_vdom_container, embeded import io import json, base64 from xml.dom.minidom import parseString from class_macro import Macros from class_plugins import Plugins from class_timer import Timer from class_custom_event import CustomEvent from class_xml_macro import XMLMacros from class_xml_timer import XMLTimer from class_xml_custom_event import XMLCustomEvent from class_xml_kv_macro_storage import XMLKvMacroStorage from class_db import Database from class_xml_plugin import XMLPlugin from class_xml_plugin_db import XMLPluginDB from class_xml_resource import XMLResource from uuid import uuid4 from widget_plugins import WidgetPlugins from VEE_resources import create_plugin_dir, ResourceFolderManager from VEE_sqlite3 import DatabaseManager from zipfile import ZipFile, ZipInfo, ZIP_DEFLATED from prosuite_localization import get_localization from prosuite_settings import settings
lang = get_localization()
@authenticated @administrator @embeded @error_handler def main(): if "formbutton_save_plugin" in request.arguments: plugin = Plugins() plugin.guid = str(uuid4()) plugin.name = request.arguments.get("formtext_name", "") plugin.author = request.arguments.get("formtext_author", "") plugin.description = request.arguments.get("formtextarea_description", "") plugin.version = request.arguments.get("formtext_version", "") plugin.zindex = "1" if plugin.name: plugin.save() create_plugin_dir(plugin.guid) if "uploader" in request.arguments: file = request.arguments.get("uploader", "", castto=Attachment) if file: plugin.picture = file.name ResourceFolderManager(plugin.guid).import_res(file.name, file.handler) plugin.save() else: self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], lang["plugins.name.error"]])
if "formbutton_upload_plugin" in request.arguments: if request.arguments.get("uploader", "", castto=Attachment): try: file = request.arguments.get("uploader", "", castto=Attachment) xml_data = file.handler.read() Plugins.install_plugin(xml_data) except Exception, ex: self.growl.active = "1" self.growl.title = lang["error.title"] self.growl.text = lang["plugins.xml_data.error"] print ex
if "formbutton_import" in request.arguments: if request.arguments.get("uploader", "", castto=Attachment): file = request.arguments.get("uploader", "", castto=Attachment) xml_data = file.handler.read() dom = parseString(xml_data) node = XMLMacros(dom)
for child in node.childs: child = XMLMacros(child) if child.name and child.source: macros = Macros() macros.name = child.name macros.code = child.source macros.class_name = child.class_name macros.is_button_macros = child.is_button macros.on_board = child.on_board
picture_name = "" macros.macros_picture = "" if child.macros_picture: macros.macros_picture = picture_name = str(uuid4()) application.storage.write(picture_name, base64.b64decode(child.macros_picture))
macros.save() else: self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], lang["plugins.xml_data.error"]])
if "op" in request.arguments and request.arguments.get('op') == 'export' and request.arguments.get('plugin_id', None) == 'all': all_plugins = Plugins.get_all() zip_name = "%s_plugins.zip" % application.name memory_file = io.BytesIO() memory_file_len = 0 with ZipFile(memory_file, 'w', compression=ZIP_DEFLATED) as zip: for p in all_plugins: output = p.export() file_meta = ZipInfo(p.name + ".xml") file_meta.compress_type = ZIP_DEFLATED zip.writestr(file_meta, output.getvalue()) memory_file_len = sum([zinfo.file_size for zinfo in zip.filelist]) zip_kb = float(memory_file_len)/1000 #kB memory_file.seek(0) response.send_file( filename=zip_name, length=zip_kb, handler=memory_file, content_type="application/zip", cache_control=False )
if "op" in request.arguments and request.arguments.get("op") == "export": plugin = Plugins.get_by_id(request.arguments.get("plugin_id", "")) output = plugin.export() output_len = output.tell() output.seek(0) response.send_file(plugin.name.encode('utf8') + ".xml", output_len, output, cache_control=False)
if "formtext_pluginid" in request.arguments: args = request.arguments plugin = Plugins.get_by_id(args.get("formtext_pluginid", "")) file = request.arguments.get("uploader", "", castto=Attachment) if plugin and file: Plugins.install_plugin(file.handler.read())
widget_plugins = WidgetPlugins() plugins_obj = Plugins.get_all() widget_plugins.set_data(plugins_obj) table = self.content.plugins_holder.datatable_plugin widget_plugins.render(datatable = table)
self.title = settings.localization["page_title"].format( page_name=lang["plugins.title"], app_name=application.name ) self.content.section_header.section_title.value = lang["plugins.title"] self.content.section_header.add.text = lang["plugins.button.add_plugin"] self.content.section_header.export.text = lang["plugins.button.export_all"]
self.dialog_add_plugin.title = lang["plugins.dialog_add_plugin.title"] self.dialog_add_plugin.form_import.formbutton_upload_plugin.label = lang["plugins.dialog_add_plugin.title"] self.dialog_add_plugin.form_new.formbutton_new.label = lang["plugins.dialog_add_plugin.create"]
self.dialog_create.title = lang["plugins.dialog_create_plugin.title"] self.dialog_create.form_create.formtext_name.placeholder = lang["plugins.dialog_create_plugin.name.text"] self.dialog_create.form_create.text_name.value = lang["plugins.plugin.name"] self.dialog_create.form_create.text_author.value = lang["plugins.plugin.author"] self.dialog_create.form_create.text_version.value = lang["plugins.plugin.version"] self.dialog_create.form_create.text_description.value = lang["plugins.plugin.description"] self.dialog_create.form_create.formbutton_save_plugin.label = lang["plugins.dialog_create_plugin.create"]
main()

country_input.action("selectItem", country_list.index(country_dict.get(user.get('country', "FR"), "France"))) email_input.action("setValue", user.get('email', "")) if user.get('phone'): phone_input.action("setValue", user.get('phone', "")) keywords_input.action("setValue", "") hidden_aim_input.action("setValue", user.get('email', "")) self.action("custom", """generatePassword()""") title, message = (lang["warning.title"], lang["ug.user_dialog.aim_found"].format(user.get('email', ""))) aim_btn.action("addClass", "attached") else: response.shared_variables['aim_email'] = email self.dialog_aim_create.form.warning_text.value = lang["ug.user_dialog.aim_not_found"].format(email) self.dialog_aim_create.form.btn_create.label = lang["ug.user_dialog.aim_create_button"] self.dialog_aim_create.form.btn_cancel.label =lang["ug.user_dialog.aim_cancel_button"] self.dialog_aim_create.action("show")
# title, message = (lang["error.title"], "Cannot create user") # hidden_aim_input.action("setValue", "")
self.growl.action("show",[title, message]) response.terminate()
try: created_obj = None if obj_type == "user":
last_name = escape(args.get('ln_input', "").strip()) first_name = escape(args.get('fn_input', "").strip()) login = escape(args.get('login_input', "").strip()) password = escape(args.get('visible_password_input', "").strip()) notif_email = escape(args.get('email_input', "").strip()) cell_phone = escape(args.get( 'phone_input', "").strip()) keywords = escape(args.get('keywords_input', "").strip()) country_index = args.get('country_input', "") aim_email = escape(args.get('hidden_aim_email', "").strip()) dialog_mode = escape(args.get('hidden_dialog_mode', "").strip())
try: country_index = int(country_index) except: country_index = "" req_fields = [ { "value": login, "field": login_input }, { "value": password, "field": visible_password_input }, { "value": first_name, "field": fn_input }, { "value": last_name, "field": ln_input }, { "value": notif_email, "field": email_input }, { "value": country_index, "field": country_input } ]
if any(req["value"] == "" for req in req_fields): info_btn.action('addClass', 'error') self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], lang["ug.fill_fields.error"]]) raise SilentException else: info_btn.action('removeClass', 'error') country = "" if country_index >= len(country_list) else country_list[country_index] user = None if obj_guid: users = ProAdmin.application().get_users(guid=obj_guid) if users: user = users[0] else: self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], lang["ug.users.exist.error"]]) raise SilentException
users = ProAdmin.application().get_users(email = login)
if users and (not user or user.guid != users[0].guid): self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], lang["ug.users.login_exist.error"]]) raise SilentException
user = user or ProAdmin.application().create_user(login)
if aim_email: attached_user = ProAdmin.application().get_user_by_appinmail_email(appinmail_email=aim_email) if attached_user: if attached_user == user: pass else: self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], 'User with Appinmail account "{}" already exists'.format(aim_email)]) raise SilentException if aim_email != notif_email:
if dialog_mode == "edit": text = u'The linked Appinmail email "{}" is different from the one entered "{}". Unlink Appinmail account or verify entered.' submit = "Unlink Appinmail email from the edited account" cancel = "Back to edit dialog" self.dialog_confrim.form.btn_create.action("setLabel", submit) self.dialog_confrim.form.btn_cancel.action("setLabel", cancel) else: text = u'The entered email "{}" is different from the mail "{}" of the entered Appinmail account. Create new without linking to Appinmail account or verify entered.'
if user.options.get("AIM"): user.options.pop("AIM") user.save()
self.dialog_confrim.form.warning_text.action("setText", text.format(notif_email, aim_email)) self.dialog_confrim.action("show") raise SilentException
AppinmailClient.default().users_get({'email': aim_email}) user.options["AIM"] = aim_email
AppinmailClient.default().set_app_to_user( { "email": aim_email, "name": settings.app_info.get("name", application.name), "url": settings.app_info.get("url", request.server.host), "logo": settings.app_info.get("logo", "") } )
hidden_aim_input.action("setValue", "")
if password not in ["", '******']: user.password = password else: if not obj_guid or not password: self.growl.action("show", [lang["error.title"], lang["ug.users.password_empty.error"]]) raise SilentException

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(() => {{
	var pass = "hidden";
	const password = document.getElementById("o_94f8a9d2_53e2_4492_bae9_e2a90334260b");
	const eye = document.getElementById("o_14c45c3a_a28f_4b6b_9288_373a53b12804");
	const tab_info = document.querySelector("#o_ef04d52f_c82b_476d_abfa_46814fb6861f a");
	const tab_group = document.querySelector("#o_57c31b9c_9b4f_49e1_a310_99c1979b44f4 a");
	const create_user_button = document.querySelector("#o_ce66c147_57fc_4565_9ea5_eb0d30877b87"); 


	create_user_button.onclick = () => {{
		pass = "hidden";
		eye.setAttribute("class","pass_eye active");
		showOrHideInputPassword( state = "shown" );
	}}; 

	eye.onclick = () => {{
		if (pass == "hidden"){{
			eye.setAttribute("class","pass_eye ");
			showOrHideInputPassword( pass );
			pass = "shown";
		}}
		else{{
			eye.setAttribute("class","pass_eye active");
			showOrHideInputPassword( pass );
			pass = "hidden";
		}};
	}}

	window.reset = function(){{
		pass = "hidden";
		eye.setAttribute("class","pass_eye active");
		showOrHideInputPassword( state = "shown" );
	}}
	function showOrHideInputPassword( state ){{
		if ( state == "hidden" ) {{
			password.setAttribute("type", "text");
		}}
		else {{
			password.setAttribute("type", "password");
		}};
	}}

	window.showOrHideTabs = (state) => {{
		if ( state == "info" ) {{
			tab_info.classList.add("active");
			tab_group.classList.remove("active");
			Obj_{slide_group_id}.hide();
			Obj_{slide_info_id}.show();
		}}
		else {{
			tab_info.classList.remove("active");
			tab_group.classList.add("active");
			Obj_{slide_group_id}.show();
			Obj_{slide_info_id}.hide();
	}}
	
	}}
}});


function showOrHideInputGroupName( item_id ){{
	if ( item_id == "new" ) {{
		Obj_{new_sf_name_id}.setValue( "" );
		Obj_{new_sf_name_id}.show();
	}}
	else {{
		Obj_{new_sf_name_id}.hide();
	}}
}}


function clearSharedVariables( vars ){{
	for (var i = 0; i < vars.length; i++ ){{
		val = vars[ i ]
		Obj_{page_id}.removeSharedVariable( val );
	}}
}}

function setSharedVariables( vars ){{
	for ( var v in vars ){{
		Obj_{page_id}.setSharedVariable( v, vars[v] );
	}}
}}

function generatePassword(){{
	var chars = "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXTZabcdefghiklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
	var string_length = 6;
	var randomstring = '';
	
	for (var i=0; i<string_length; i++) {{
		var rnum = Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length);
		randomstring += chars.substring(rnum,rnum+1);
	}}
	console.log(randomstring);
	Obj_{visible_password_id}.setValue( randomstring );
}}

function arraysSubtraction( a1, a2 ){{
	return jQuery.grep(	a1,function (item) {{
			return jQuery.inArray(item, a2) < 0;
			}});
}}

function arraysCombine( a1, a2 ){{
	return jQuery.unique( jQuery.merge( a1,a2 ) );
}}

function counSelectedUsers(keyList) {{
	setSelectedObjects(keyList);
	Obj_{users_count_text}.setText("{user_count} " + keyList.length);

}}
function counSelectedGroups(keyList) {{
	setSelectedObjects(keyList);
	Obj_{groups_count_text}.setText("{group_count} " + keyList.length);
}}
function setSelectedObjects( keyList ){{
	if (e2vdomSV["displayedObjects"].length == 0){{
		Obj_{page_id}.setSharedVariable( "selectedObjects", keyList );
	}}
	else{{
		Obj_{page_id}.setSharedVariable( "selectedObjects", arraysCombine( arraysSubtraction( e2vdomSV["selectedObjects"], e2vdomSV["displayedObjects"]),keyList) );
	}}
}}

</script>

import datetime
class VEE_timer(object): def __init__(self, name, delay, hash_value ): """delay should be in format 00:00:00:00, where each digit - delay in day:hr:min:sec""" self.delay = map(int,delay.split(':')) self.name = name self.active = True self.hash_value = hash_value self.last_run = datetime.datetime.now() if not len(self.delay) == 4: raise Exception ("Timer delay have invalid format")
def check(self): """Return true if since last run needed time already passed. Timer should be active""" if self.active and self.last_run + datetime.timedelta(days = self.delay[0], hours=self.delay[1],minutes=self.delay[2], seconds = self.delay[3])<=datetime.datetime.now(): self.last_run = datetime.datetime.now() return True

def create_external_scheme(): import ProAdmin import re from proadmin_ldap_connection import LDAPConnection from proadmin_external_settings import ProAdminSchemeConfig from proadmin_ldapconfig import LDAPConfig
active_config = ProAdminSchemeConfig.get_active() connection_settings= ProAdminSchemeConfig.get_connection_settings()
active_config['base_dn'] = connection_settings['base_dn']
server = connection_settings['server'] login = connection_settings['login'] password = connection_settings['password']
active_config = LDAPConfig(active_config.attributes, active_config.name)
# try to connect to active directory by some dn def try_bind(dn): return LDAPConnection.try_bind(server, dn, password)
# if login cantains '=' and ',' symbols - it's some dn string if re.search('[=,]', login): dn = login else: user_dn = 'cn=Users' dn = "%(uid)s=%(login)s,%(user_dn)s,%(base_dn)s" % { "uid" : active_config.get_attribute('user_guid'), "login" : login, "user_dn" : user_dn, "base_dn" : active_config.get_attribute('base_dn'), }
if not try_bind(dn): dn += ',' + active_config.get_attribute('base_dn')
user_connection = LDAPConnection() user_connection.bind(server, dn, password)
server = '127.0.0.1' login = 'cn=admin,dc=vdombox,dc=local' password = 'passwd'
local_connection = LDAPConnection() local_connection.bind(server, login, password)
scheme = ProAdmin.external_scheme(application.id, local_connection, user_connection, active_config) scheme.set_option('base_dn', connection_settings['base_dn']) scheme.set_option('root_user', connection_settings['root_user']) return scheme

CONFIG_IDs = { 'active_directory' : '-1', 'vdombox.ru' : '-2', 'local' : '0', 'create new config..' : '-3' }
class LDAPConfig( object ): def __init__( self, attributes = {}, config = '' ): self.id = CONFIG_IDs.get( config, '' ) self.name = config if config and not attributes: self.attributes = self.create_config( config = config ).attributes else: self.attributes = attributes
@classmethod def create_config( self, config = 'local' ): """ config can be 'local', 'vdombox.ru', 'active_directory' """ attributes = { "first_name" : "", "last_name" : "", "email" : "", "phone" : "", "notification_email": "", "cell_phone" : "", "country" : "", "keywords" : "", "password" : "", "user_dn" : "", "group_dn" : "", "user_guid" : "", "group_guid" : "", "base_dn" : "", "groups_in_user" : '', "users_in_group" : "", "user_class" : [''], "group_class" : [''], "group_name" : '', }
if config == 'local': attributes = { "first_name" : "givenName", "last_name" : "sn", "email" : "uid", "phone" : "telephoneNumber", "notification_email": "mail", "cell_phone" : "mobile", "country" : "homePostalAddress", "keywords" : "description", "password" : "userPassword", "user_dn" : "ou=users,ou=%s" % application.id, "group_dn" : "ou=users,ou=%s" % application.id, "user_guid" : "cn", "group_guid" : "cn", "base_dn" : "dc=vdombox,dc=local", "groups_in_user" : '', "users_in_group" : "member", "user_class" : [ 'top', 'person', 'organizationalPerson', 'inetOrgPerson' ], "group_class" : [ 'groupOfNames' ], "crypt" : 'md5', "group_name" : 'o', }
elif config == 'vdombox.ru': attributes = { "first_name" : "cn", "last_name" : "sn", "email" : "uid", "phone" : "telephoneNumber", "password" : "userPassword", "user_dn" : "ou=developers", "group_dn" : "ou=groups", "user_guid" : "uid", "group_guid" : "cn", "group_name" : "cn", "base_dn" : "dc=vdombox,dc=ru", "groups_in_user" : '', "users_in_group" : "member", "user_class" : [ 'top', 'person', 'organizationalPerson', 'inetOrgPerson' ], "group_class" : [ 'groupOfNames' ], "crypt" : 'base64_sha', }
elif config == 'active_directory': attributes = { "first_name" : "givenName", "last_name" : "sn", "email" : "sAMAccountName", "phone" : "telephoneNumber", # "password" : "userPassword", # "user_dn" : "cn=Users", # "group_dn" : "cn=Groups", "user_guid" : "cn", "group_guid" : "cn", "group_name" : "cn", # "base_dn" : "dc=ad,dc=vdombox,dc=local", "groups_in_user" : "", "users_in_group" : "member", "user_class" : [ "User" ], "group_class" : [ "Group" ], "crypt" : "md5", "notification_email": "mail", "keywords" : "description", "country" : "co", "cell_phone" : "mobile", }
return LDAPConfig( attributes = attributes, config = config )
def __getitem__( self, key ): return self.attributes.get( key, '' )
def __setitem__( self, key, value ): self.attributes[ key ] = value
def __delitem__( self, key ): if key in self.attributes: del self.attributes[ key ]
def get_attribute( self, attribute_name, default = '' ): return self.attributes.get( attribute_name, default )
def add_attribute( self, name, value ): self.attributes[ name ] = value
def set_attribute( self, name, value ): self.attributes[ name ] = value
def get_login( self, username ): if not username: return ''
uid = self.get_attribute( 'user_guid' ) user_dn = self.get_attribute( 'user_dn' ) base_dn = self.get_attribute( 'base_dn' )
dn = "%(uid)s=%(login)s,%(user_dn)s,%(base_dn)s" % { "uid" : uid, "login" : username, "user_dn" : user_dn, "base_dn" : base_dn, }
return dn
def get_group_dn( self, guid, base_dn ): if not guid: return ''
guid_attr = self.get_attribute( 'group_guid' ) group_dn = self.get_attribute( 'group_dn' )
dn = "%(guid_attr)s=%(guid)s,%(group_dn)s,%(base_dn)s" % { "guid_attr" : guid_attr, "guid" : guid, "group_dn" : group_dn, "base_dn" : base_dn, }
return dn
def get_user_dn( self, guid, base_dn ): if not guid: return ''
guid_attr = self.get_attribute( 'user_guid' ) user_dn = self.get_attribute( 'user_dn' )
dn = "%(guid_attr)s=%(guid)s,%(user_dn)s,%(base_dn)s" % { "guid_attr" : guid_attr, "guid" : guid, "user_dn" : user_dn, "base_dn" : base_dn, }
return dn
def get_user_guid( self ): guid = self.attributes.get( 'user_guid' ) for k, v in self.attributes.items(): if v == guid: return k return 'dn'
def get_group_guid( self ): guid = self.attributes.get( 'group_guid' ) for k, v in self.attributes.items(): if v == guid: return k return 'dn'

@classmethod def get_by_id( self, id ): from class_db import Database
for config_name, config_id in CONFIG_IDs.items(): if str( config_id ) == str( id ): return LDAPConfig( config = config_name )
query = """ SELECT email, phone, password, group_dn, user_dn, user_guid, group_guid, base_dn, groups_in_user, users_in_group, user_class, group_class, group_name, first_name, last_name, config_name, id FROM subject_config WHERE id = ? """ values = (id,)
db_row = Database.maindb().fetch_one( query, values ) return LDAPConfig().__fill_from_row( db_row ) if db_row else None
def __fill_from_row( self, row ): from class_db import Database
# define order of attributes keys = [ 'email', 'phone', 'password', 'group_dn', 'user_dn', 'user_guid', 'group_guid', 'base_dn', 'groups_in_user', 'users_in_group', 'user_class', 'group_class', 'group_name', 'first_name', 'last_name' ]
# fill attrbutes self.attributes.clear()
for i in range( len(keys) ): key = keys[i] value = row[i] if row[i] != u'NULL' else u''
if key in [ 'group_class', 'user_class' ]: value = [ value ]
self[ key ] = value
self.name = row[15] self.id = row[16]
return self

query = """ INSERT INTO subject_config (email, phone, password, group_dn, user_dn, user_guid, group_guid, group_name, base_dn, groups_in_user, users_in_group, user_class, group_class, first_name, last_name, config_name) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) """
values = ( self[ 'email' ], self[ 'phone' ], self[ 'password' ], self[ 'group_dn' ], self[ 'user_dn' ], self[ 'user_guid' ], self[ 'group_guid' ], self[ 'group_name' ], self[ 'base_dn' ], self[ 'groups_in_user' ], self[ 'users_in_group' ], self[ 'user_class' ][-1], self[ 'group_class' ][-1], self[ 'first_name' ], self[ 'last_name' ], self.name, )
self.id = Database.maindb().commit( query, values ) return id

if self.id in CONFIG_IDs.values(): return self.id = id query = """ UPDATE subject_config SET email = ?, phone = ?, password = ?, group_dn = ?, user_dn = ?, user_guid = ?, group_guid = ?, group_name = ?, base_dn = ?, groups_in_user = ?, users_in_group = ?, user_class = ?, group_class = ?, first_name = ?, last_name = ?, config_name = ? WHERE id = ?"""
values = ( self[ 'email' ], self[ 'phone' ], self[ 'password' ], self[ 'group_dn' ], self[ 'user_dn' ], self[ 'user_guid' ], self[ 'group_guid' ], self[ 'group_name' ], self[ 'base_dn' ], self[ 'groups_in_user' ], self[ 'users_in_group' ], self[ 'user_class' ][-1], self[ 'group_class' ][-1], self[ 'first_name' ], self[ 'last_name' ], self.name, self.id, )
Database.maindb().commit( query, values )

@classmethod def get_name_list( self ): from class_db import Database
rows = Database.maindb().fetch_all("""SELECT id, config_name FROM subject_config""")

from proadmin_base_scheme import BaseProAdminScheme from proadmin_ldapconfig import LDAPConfig
class LocalLDAPApplicationScheme( BaseProAdminScheme ): """ ProAdmin scheme working with """ def __init__( self, guid=None, connection=None ): BaseProAdminScheme.__init__( self, guid, connection, connection )
self.type = 'local' self.config = LDAPConfig.create_config( config = 'local' )
self.set_option( 'base_dn', "dc=vdombox,dc=local" )
self.set_option( 'root_user', 'root' ) self.set_option( 'admin_group', 'Administrators' )
def create_root_user( self, password='root' ): """ create super user for this scheme """ # get root user email = self.get_option( 'root_user' ) users = self.get_users( email ) root = users[0] if users else None
if not root: root = self.create_user( email ) root.first_name = email root.password = password root.save()
# try to get admins group name = self.get_option( 'admin_group' ) admins = self.get_groups( name ) admins = admins[0] if admins else None
if not admins: return root
# check that root in admins group if root not in admins.get_users(): admins.add_user( root ) admins.save()
return root
def create_admins_group( self ): """ group of application administrators """ # try to get admins group name = self.get_option( 'admin_group' ) admins = self.get_groups( name ) admins = admins[0] if admins else None
# creat group if need if not admins: admins = self.create_group( name ) admins.save()
# add root user to group email = self.get_option( 'root_user' ) users = self.get_users( email ) root = users[0] if users else None
if not root: return admins
if root not in admins.get_users(): admins.add_user( root ) admins.save()
return admins
def create_user( self, email='' ): users = self.get_users( email ) if email else [] if users: return users[0]
from proadmin_subject import LDAPUser return LDAPUser.create( scheme = self, email = email )
def create_group( self, name='' ): groups = self.get_groups( name ) if name else [] if groups: return groups[0]
from proadmin_subject import LDAPGroup return LDAPGroup.create( scheme = self, name = name )
def get_users( self, email=None, guid=None ): from proadmin_subject import LDAPUser return LDAPUser.get_users( self, email=email, guid=guid )
def get_groups( self, name=None, user=None, guid=None ): from proadmin_subject import LDAPGroup groups = user.get_groups() if user else LDAPGroup.get_groups( scheme = self, guid = guid, name = name ) return groups
def check_password( self, user, password ): return user.check_local_password( password )

import cStringIO import gzip import logging import os import sys import traceback import weakref
from collections import deque from logging.handlers import RotatingFileHandler
from prosuite_settings import logging_settings
class DequeMemoryHandler(logging.Handler): """ A handler class which buffers logging records in memory. Whenever each record is added to the buffer, a check is made to see if the buffer should be flushed. If it should, then flush() is expected to do what's needed. """
def __init__(self, capacity): """ Initialize the handler with the buffer size. """ logging.Handler.__init__(self) self.capacity = capacity self.buffer = deque(maxlen=capacity)
def emit(self, record): """ Emit a record """ self.buffer.append(record)
def flush(self): """ Override to implement custom flushing behaviour.
This version just zaps the buffer to empty. """ self.buffer.clear()
def close(self): """ Close the handler.
This version just flushes and chains to the parent class' close(). """ try: self.flush() finally: if logging: logging.Handler.close(self)
def handle(self, record): """ Conditionally emit the specified logging record.
Emission depends on filters which may have been added to the handler. Returns whether the filter passed the record foremission. """ rv = self.filter(record) if rv: self.emit(record) return rv
class RotatingGzipFileHandler(RotatingFileHandler):
def doRollover(self): """ Do a rollover and gzip file """ if self.stream: # close existing stream self.stream.close() self.stream = None
if self.backupCount > 0: # iterate over existing file for i in range(self.backupCount - 1, 0, -1): sfn = "%s.%d.gz" % (self.baseFilename, i) dfn = "%s.%d.gz" % (self.baseFilename, i + 1) if os.path.exists(sfn): #print "%s -> %s" % (sfn, dfn) if os.path.exists(dfn): os.remove(dfn) os.rename(sfn, dfn)
dfn = self.baseFilename + ".1.gz" if os.path.exists(dfn): os.remove(dfn)
# Issue 18940: A file may not have been created if delay is True. if os.path.exists(self.baseFilename): sfh = open(self.baseFilename, "rb") dfh = gzip.open(dfn, "wb") dfh.writelines(sfh) dfh.close() sfh.close() try: os.remove(os.path.normpath(self.baseFilename)) except WindowsError: pass
if not self.delay: self.stream = self._open()
class ExcPlusFormatter(logging.Formatter): """ """ def format(self, record): """ Format the specified record as text.
The record's attribute dictionary is used as the operand to a string formatting operation which yields the returned string. Before formatting the dictionary, a couple of preparatory steps are carried out. The message attribute of the record is computed using LogRecord.getMessage(). If the formatting string uses the time (as determined by a call to usesTime(), formatTime() is called to format the event time. If there is exception information, it is formatted using formatException() and appended to the message. """ record.message = record.getMessage() if self.usesTime(): record.asctime = self.formatTime(record, self.datefmt) s = self._fmt % record.__dict__ if record.exc_info: # Cache the traceback text to avoid converting it multiple times # (it's constant anyway) if not hasattr(record, "exc_text_ext"): setattr(record, "exc_text_ext", self.formatException(record.exc_info))
if getattr(record, "exc_text_ext", None) : if s[-1:] != "\n": s = s + "\n" try: s = s + record.exc_text_ext except UnicodeError: # Sometimes filenames have non-ASCII chars, which can lead # to errors when s is Unicode and record.exc_text_ext is str # See issue 8924. # We also use replace for when there are multiple # encodings, e.g. UTF-8 for the filesystem and latin-1 # for a script. See issue 13232. s = s + record.exc_text_ext.decode(sys.getfilesystemencoding(), "replace") return s
def formatException(self, ei): """ Format and return the specified exception information as a string.
This default implementation just uses traceback.print_exception() """ tb = sys.exc_info()[2] while 1: if not tb.tb_next: break tb = tb.tb_next
stack = [] f = tb.tb_frame while f: stack.append(f) f = f.f_back
stack = reversed(stack)
sio = cStringIO.StringIO() traceback.print_exception(ei[0], ei[1], ei[2], None, sio)
sio.write("%s\n%s" % ("*"*10, "Locals by frame, innermost last")) for frame in stack: sio.write("\n\nFrame \"%s\" in %s:%s at line %s:" % ( frame.f_code.co_name, frame.f_code.co_filename, frame.f_code.co_firstlineno, frame.f_lineno ))
for key, value in frame.f_locals.items(): sio.write("\n\t%20s = " % key) #We have to be careful not to cause a new error in our error #printer! Calling str() on an unknown object could cause an #error we don't want. try: sio.write("%s :: %s" % (str(type(value)), str(value))) except: sio.write("<ERROR WHILE PRINTING VALUE>")
sio.write("\n\n") traceback.print_exception(ei[0], ei[1], ei[2], None, sio) sio.write("%s\n" % ("*"*10))
s = sio.getvalue() sio.close()
return s
class ProSuiteRootLogger(logging.Logger): """ """ def getChild(self, suffix): return self.manager.getLogger(suffix)
# Create unique root logger manager = logging.Manager(None) manager.setLoggerClass(ProSuiteRootLogger)
root_logger = manager.getLogger("System") root_logger.setLevel(logging_settings["level"]) root_logger.manager = manager
manager.root = weakref.proxy(root_logger) manager.setLoggerClass(logging.Logger)
# create rotating logs handler logs_path = application.storage.abs_path(logging_settings["file"]) logs_dir = os.path.dirname(logs_path)
try: os.stat(logs_dir) except Exception as ex: application.storage.mkdir(logs_dir)
rotating_hdlr = RotatingGzipFileHandler( logs_path, maxBytes=logging_settings["max_size"], backupCount=logging_settings["parts"] )
# create default formatting default_fmt = ExcPlusFormatter("%(asctime)s :: %(name)-12s :: %(levelname)-8s :: %(thread)s :: %(message)s") rotating_hdlr.setFormatter(default_fmt) root_logger.addHandler(rotating_hdlr)
# !!! this raise exception in application_onstart global action !!! # root_logger.info("Logging system setup for application %s [%s] done!", # application.name, # application.id # )
root_logger.info("Logging level is %s", logging.getLevelName(logging_settings["level"]))
# create application level logger app_logger = root_logger.getChild(application.name)
# setup logs which will be stored in memory logs_in_memory = DequeMemoryHandler(capacity=logging_settings["max_mem_records"]) app_logger.addHandler(logs_in_memory)
app_logger.info("Application logger created!")

    ") # Application node result_str.write( u"""
  • %(name)s
    """ % { 'guid' : self.__app.guid, 'name' : self.__app.name, 'type' : "Application" } ) result_str.write(u"
      ") # objects node if not self.__app_ldap: raise Exception(self.lang["rules.no_app_error.text"]) # objects = [] # for obj in self.__app_ldap.child_objects(): # objects.append( obj ) # objects += self.get_childs( obj ) # # for obj in objects: # result_str.write(u"""

import ProAdmin import json from io import StringIO from collections import OrderedDict from prosuite_localization import get_localization class WidgetAddUsersToGroupDialog(object): def __init__(self,list): self.__list = list # list of ID's (GUID) def render(self, dialog, formlist_groups, list_users, new_group_name): users, groups = ProAdmin.application().get_users(),\ ProAdmin.application().get_groups() lang = get_localization() data_dict = OrderedDict() new_group_name.action("setValue") if not groups: formlist_groups.selectedvalue = "new" new_group_name.action("show") else: new_group_name.action("hide") for group in groups[0:-1]: data_dict[group.guid] = group.name data_dict[groups[-1].guid] = "%s" % groups[-1].name formlist_groups.selectedvalue = groups[0].guid data_dict["new"] = lang["ug.header.group.create"] formlist_groups.value = json.dumps(data_dict) template = u"

from prosuite_localization import get_localization from prosuite_settings import settings from collections import OrderedDict from ProSuiteMacrosWidget import ProSuiteMacrosWidget from class_plugins import Plugins import ProAdmin import json from proadmin_sso import SSOUrl from utilities import current_page_name MENU_OPTIONS_HTML = u"""
{label} """ PROADMIN_ID = "491d4c93-4089-4517-93d3-82326298da44" class WidgetHeader(object): def __init__(self, header): self.HEADER = header self.HEADER_MENU = self.HEADER.header_menu self.HEADER_BUTTONS = self.HEADER_MENU.buttons_list self.OPT_BUTTON = self.HEADER_MENU.options self.OPT_MENU = self.HEADER.opt_menu self.PLUGIN_PANEL = self.HEADER.plugin_panel self.PRODUCT_LIST = self.HEADER.change_product self.LOC = get_localization() self.APP_ID = application.id self.PROTOCOL = SSOUrl.current_protocol() or 'http' def render_plugin_macroses(self): page_name = current_page_name(e2vdom=True) plugins = Plugins.get_all() plugin_macro = {plugin.guid: plugin.get_macros() for plugin in plugins} ProSuiteMacrosWidget().render( self.PLUGIN_PANEL.plugin_menu_wrapper.plugins_list, img_holder=None, page_name=page_name, plugins=plugins, plugin_macro=plugin_macro, ) self.PLUGIN_PANEL.action("toggleClass", ["hidden"]) def render_product_list(self): CURR_USER = ProAdmin.current_user() check_proadmin = lambda: self.APP_ID == PROADMIN_ID products_list = self._get_proadmin_apps() if check_proadmin() else self._get_apps() # Last - user and log out if CURR_USER is not None: CURR_USER = str(CURR_USER) if len(str(CURR_USER))<10 else str(CURR_USER)[:10] + "..." products_list.update({"user": "%s" % CURR_USER}) products_list.update({"exit": "%s" % self.LOC["header.logout_label"]}) self.PRODUCT_LIST.data = json.dumps(products_list) def _get_apps(self): app_dict = settings.product_list APPS = ProAdmin.get_registred_applications() result = [app_dict[APPS[a]["guid"]] for a in APPS if app_dict.get(APPS[a]["guid"])] # shift current app to 0 index result.insert(0, result.pop(result.index(app_dict[application.id]))) return OrderedDict(result) def _get_proadmin_apps(self): apps = ProAdmin.get_proadmin_applications() app_dict = settings.product_list products_list = OrderedDict([app_dict[self.APP_ID]]) products_list.update( app_dict[a.app_box_guid] for a in apps if app_dict.get(a.app_box_guid) ) return products_list def render_header_buttons(self): BUTTONS = settings.header_buttons span_temp = u"{}" self.HEADER_BUTTONS.data = json.dumps( OrderedDict((k, span_temp.format("active" if request.environment["SCRIPT_NAME"] in v["active_link"] else "", v["label"] ), ) for k, v in BUTTONS.iteritems() ) ) def render_options_menu(self): current_user = ProAdmin.current_user() if bool(ProAdmin.application().rules(subject=current_user, access='a')): result = {} # Filling the final dictionary with values for b in settings.header_opt_menu: result.update(b) # Filling in HTML and localizing for k in result.keys(): result[k] = MENU_OPTIONS_HTML.format( label=result[k]["label"], link=result[k]["link"] ) self.OPT_MENU.data = json.dumps(OrderedDict(sorted(result.items()))) self.OPT_BUTTON.visible = "1" else: self.OPT_BUTTON.visible = "0" def _get_user_link(self): apps = ProAdmin.get_registred_applications() if ProAdmin.scheme().is_remote(): res = "{}://{}/edit_account/".format( self.PROTOCOL, apps["ProAdmin"]["hosts"][0] ) elif self.APP_ID == PROADMIN_ID: res = "/edit_account" else: res = "/users_and_groups?action=show_user" return res def get_app_url(self, goal): check_proadmin = lambda: self.APP_ID == PROADMIN_ID not_app = { 'user': self._get_user_link(), 'exit': '/logoff' } # goal is't application if goal in not_app.keys(): res = not_app[goal] # goal is current application elif application.id == settings.app_guid[goal]: res = settings.pages["home"] # goal is one of registered application else: app_host = self._get_proadmin_app_url(goal) if check_proadmin() else self._get_app_url(goal) res = self.PROTOCOL + '://' + app_host return res def _get_app_url(self, goal): apps = ProAdmin.get_registred_applications() for name in apps: app = apps[name] if app["guid"] == settings.app_guid[goal]: app_host = app["hosts"][0] if "hosts" in app else "" if app_host: return app_host def _get_proadmin_app_url(self, goal): apps = ProAdmin.get_proadmin_applications() for a in apps: if a.app_box_guid == settings.app_guid[goal]: app_host = a.hosts[0] if len(a.hosts) > 0 else "" if app_host: return app_host def localize_header(self): self.HEADER_MENU.options.value = self.LOC["header.options"] self.HEADER_MENU.show_plugins_panel.value = self.LOC["header.plugins"] self.PLUGIN_PANEL.plugin_panel_header.title_holder.value = self.LOC["header.plugins"] def render_style_mixin(self): self.HEADER.styles.app_styles_mixin.data = getattr( settings, 'styles_mixin', '/* place for integration custom app styles from prosuite_settings.style_mixin */' ) def render(self): self.render_style_mixin() self.render_product_list() self.render_header_buttons() self.render_options_menu() self.localize_header()

import json from class_plugins import Plugins from prosuite_localization import get_localization CONFIG_MACRO_NAME = "config" class WidgetMacrosDatatable( object ): def __init__(self, plugin_guid, page_name=None): self.page_name = page_name self.plugin_guid = plugin_guid def render(self, datatable, dialog): LANG = get_localization() plugin = Plugins.get_by_guid(self.plugin_guid) if not plugin: raise Exception(LANG["plugins.not_exist.error"]%self.plugin_guid) data = [] for macro in plugin.get_macros(): if macro.on_board != "1" and \ macro.is_button_macros == "1" and \ macro.page == self.page_name and \ macro.name != CONFIG_MACRO_NAME: data.append(( macro.guid, ""%macro.macros_picture if macro.macros_picture else "", macro.name )) datatable.data = json.dumps(data) dialog.title = plugin.name

import json from prosuite_localization import get_localization from class_timer import Timer from class_custom_event import CustomEvent from class_macro import Macros from class_plugins import Plugins from config import config from VEE_events import event_map
class WidgetMacrosDialog(object): def __init__(self, root, macros_id, plugin_id, macro_type=Macros.MacrosType.UNKNOWN): self.root = root self.dialog = self.root.dialog_create_macro self.form_macro = self.dialog.form_macro self.container_back = self.form_macro.container_back self.macro_type = macro_type self.macros_id = macros_id self.plugin_id = plugin_id self.lang = get_localization()
def setup_event_type_controls(self): plugin = Plugins.get_by_id(self.plugin_id) self.container_back.formlist_location.visible = "0" self.container_back.text_location.visible = "0" self.container_back.formlist_event.visible = "1" self.container_back.text_event.visible = "1" self.container_back.text_event.value = self.lang["plugins.macros.create.event"] self.container_back.formlist_page.visible = "0" self.container_back.text_timer.visible = "0"
event_dict = {} for event in event_map: event_dict[event] = self.lang.get(event_map[event].__name__, event_map[event].__name__)
for timer in Timer.get_timer_by_plugin_guid(plugin.guid): event_dict[timer.guid] = timer.name
for cevent in CustomEvent.get_custom_event_by_plugin_guid(plugin.guid): event_dict[cevent.guid] = cevent.name
self.container_back.formlist_event.value = json.dumps(event_dict)
def setup_button_type_controls(self): self.container_back.formlist_page.value = json.dumps(config["plugin_page_dict"]) self.container_back.formlist_page.selectedvalue = getattr( Macros.get_by_id(self.macros_id), 'page', None ) self.container_back.formlist_location.visible = "1" self.container_back.text_location.visible = "1" self.container_back.text_location.value = self.lang["plugins.macros.create.location"] self.container_back.formlist_event.visible = "0" self.container_back.text_event.visible = "0" self.container_back.formlist_location.value = json.dumps( { "1" : self.lang["plugins.macros.create.on_panel"], "2" : self.lang["plugins.macros.create.in_menu"] })
def setup_library_type_controls(self): self.container_back.formlist_page.visible = "0" self.container_back.formlist_location.visible = "0" self.container_back.text_location.visible = "0" self.container_back.formlist_event.visible = "0" self.container_back.text_event.visible = "0" self.container_back.text_timer.visible = "0"
def render_by_macro_type(self): if self.macro_type == Macros.MacrosType.UNKNOWN: self.macro_type = Macros.MacrosType.EVENT
self.container_back.formlist_type.selectedvalue = self.macro_type
if self.macro_type == Macros.MacrosType.BUTTON: self.setup_button_type_controls()
elif self.macro_type in Macros.MacrosType.EVENT: self.setup_event_type_controls() else: self.setup_library_type_controls()
def render_by_macro(self):
macros = Macros.get_by_id(self.macros_id) self.form_macro.formtext_id.value = self.macros_id self.form_macro.formtext_name.value = macros.name self.form_macro.formtextarea_description.value = macros.description self.macro_type = macros.type if macros.type == Macros.MacrosType.EVENT: # setup_event_type_controls(self.plugin_id)
if macros.timer_guid: self.container_back.formlist_event.action("selectItem", [macros.timer_guid]) elif macros.custom_event_guid: self.container_back.formlist_event.action("selectItem", [macros.custom_event_guid]) elif macros.class_name: for event in event_map: if event_map[event].__name__ == macros.class_name: self.container_back.formlist_event.action("selectItem", [event]) break
elif macros.type == Macros.MacrosType.BUTTON: # setup_button_type_controls() self.container_back.formlist_location.action("selectItem", [ "1" if macros.on_board == "1" else "2"]) self.container_back.formlist_page.selectedvalue = macros.page
def render_formlist_type(self): self.container_back.formlist_type.value = json.dumps({ Macros.MacrosType.EVENT: self.lang["plugins.macros.create.type.event"], Macros.MacrosType.BUTTON: self.lang["plugins.macros.create.type.button"], Macros.MacrosType.LIBRARY: self.lang["plugins.macros.create.type.lib"] })
def localization(self): self.form_macro.text_macro_name.value = self.lang["plugins.macros.create.name"] self.form_macro.container_back.text_type.value = self.lang["plugins.macros.create.type"] self.form_macro.text_description.value = self.lang["plugins.macros.create.description"] self.form_macro.formbutton_cancel.label = self.lang["form.buttons.cancel"] self.form_macro.formbutton_save.label = self.lang["form.buttons.apply"]
def render(self, type="create"): if self.macros_id and self.macro_type == Macros.MacrosType.UNKNOWN: self.render_by_macro() self.render_by_macro_type() self.render_formlist_type() self.localization()
self.dialog.title = self.lang["plugins.macros.create.title" if type == "create" else "plugins.macros.edit.title"] self.dialog.action("show")

import ProAdmin import json from prosuite_localization import get_localization class WidgetProAdminUsers: def __init__( self ): self.__datatabe = None self.__page = 0 self.users = ProAdmin.application().get_users() self.__per_page = 10 def set_page(self,page): self.__page = page - 1 def render(self, datatable, pager = None): lang = get_localization() pages_count = 0 data = [] objects = self.users count = len( objects ) # users count left = self.__page * self.__per_page # from - index right = left + self.__per_page if left + self.__per_page <= count else count # to - index pages_count = str( count/self.__per_page + 1 )\ if count % self.__per_page > 0 \ else str( count/ self.__per_page )# number of pages datatable.header = json.dumps([u"guid", lang["proadmin.users.account_column"], lang["proadmin.users.name_column"], lang["proadmin.users.login_column"]]) for obj in objects[left:right]: data.append([obj.guid, obj.name, obj.email, ""]) datatable.data = json.dumps(data) if data: pager.pagescount = pages_count pager.currentpage = self.__page+1 pager.top = str( 237 + 38 * len(data ) + 100 ) datatable.visible = pager.visible = "1" else: pager.action("hide")

import ProAdmin import os from class_remote_settings import RemoteSettings from prosuite_localization import get_localization from vdom_remote_api import VDOMService,VDOMServiceSingleThread from socket import gethostbyname from sys import platform from md5 import md5 from proadmin_remote_sync import RemoteSyncClient from proadmin_sso import SSOClient from SOAPpy.Errors import Error, HTTPError from SOAPpy.Types import faultType SUCCESS_HTML_TMP = "

%s

" FAIL_HTML_TMP = "

%s

" class WidgetRemoteScheme(object): def __init__(self, root): self.ROOT = root self.CONTAINER_REMOTE = self.ROOT.container_remote self.FORM_REMOTE = self.CONTAINER_REMOTE.form_remote self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE = self.ROOT.container_remote_state_new self.REMOTE_SCHEME_CONTENT = self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE.remote_scheme_content self.CONTAINER_PROADMIN = self.REMOTE_SCHEME_CONTENT.container_proadmin self.CONTAINER_LOCAL_STATE = self.ROOT.container_local_state self.DIALOG_TEST_SSO = self.ROOT.dialog_test_sso self.DIALOG_SSO_SUCCESS = self.ROOT.dialog_sso_success self.APP_ID = ProAdmin.PROADMIN_APPLICATION_GUID self.GROWL = self.ROOT.growl self.LANG = get_localization() self._correct_flag = True def reset_srttings(self): response.shared_variables["host"] = self.FORM_REMOTE.formtext_host.value = "" response.shared_variables["login"] = self.FORM_REMOTE.formtext_login.value = "" response.shared_variables["password"] = self.FORM_REMOTE.formpassword.value = "" self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.visible = "0" self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.height = "18" self.localization() def save_remote_scheme(self, host, login, password): self.check_fields(host, login, password) self.render_local_container(host, login, password) if self._correct_flag: try: host = host.replace("https://", "").replace("http://", "").replace("/", "") host = ProAdmin.hosts(host)[0] RemoteSettings(login, password, host).save() ProAdmin.logoff() ProAdmin.unregister_default_scheme() ProAdmin.scheme() session["from_license_page"] = "0" self.ROOT.action("goTo", ["/logoff"]) except Exception,ex: error = str(ex.__class__).replace("<","<") err_txt = "" if "socket.gaierror" in error : err_txt = self.LANG["socket.gaierror"] elif "socket.error" in error: err_txt = self.LANG["socket.error"] elif "faultType" in error or "NameError" in error: err_txt = self.LANG["faultType"] else: err_txt = error self.GROWL.action("show",[self.LANG["error.title"], err_txt]) def save_local_scheme(self): try: if RemoteSettings.get_remote_setting(): RemoteSettings.delete() ProAdmin.logoff() ProAdmin.unregister_default_scheme() ProAdmin.scheme() session["from_license_page"] = "0" self.ROOT.action("goTo", ["/logoff"]) except Exception, ex: self.GROWL.action('show', [self.LANG["error.title"], str(ex)]) def check_sso_tested(self): ssoclient = SSOClient(request, response) if ssoclient.test_sso(check = True) and session.get("sso_tested", "0") == "1": session["sso_tested"] = "0" self.DIALOG_SSO_SUCCESS.show = "1" def _check_ping(self, host): host = host.replace("https://", "").replace("http://", "").replace("/", "") text_ping_done = self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.ping_done"] + gethostbyname(host) connection_to_ip = SUCCESS_HTML_TMP%(text_ping_done) if "win" in platform: command = os.system('ping -n 1 ' + gethostbyname(host)) if "linux" in platform: command = os.system('ping -c 1 ' + gethostbyname(host)) if command != 0: connection_to_ip = FAIL_HTML_TMP%(self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.ping_error"]) return connection_to_ip def _open_session(self, host, login, password): open_session = "" if self._correct_flag: try: if isinstance(VDOMService(host, login, md5(password).hexdigest(), self.APP_ID).open_session(), VDOMServiceSingleThread): open_session = SUCCESS_HTML_TMP%(self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.open_session_done"] + "(" + host + ", " + login + ")") else: self._correct_flag = False open_session = FAIL_HTML_TMP%(self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.open_session_error"]) except Error, ex: self._correct_flag = False error_text = "" if isinstance(ex, faultType): error_text = self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.login_error"] elif isinstance(ex, HTTPError): error_text = self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.vdom_error"] open_session = FAIL_HTML_TMP%(error_text) return open_session def _check_proadmin(self, host, login, password): proadmin_version = "" if self._correct_flag: try: proadmin_info = RemoteSyncClient(VDOMService(host, login, md5(password).hexdigest(), self.APP_ID)).proadmin_version(True) if not isinstance(proadmin_info, dict): proadmin_info = {'name' : 'ProAdmin', 'version' : proadmin_info} if proadmin_info: proadmin_version = SUCCESS_HTML_TMP%(proadmin_info["name"] + " (" + proadmin_info["version"] + ")") else: self._correct_flag = False proadmin_version = FAIL_HTML_TMP%(self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.proadmin_error"]) except: self._correct_flag = False proadmin_version = FAIL_HTML_TMP%(self.LANG["remotescheme.proadmin_check.proadmin_error"]) return proadmin_version def check_fields(self, host, login, password): if not host or not login or not password: self.GROWL.action("show", [self.LANG["error.title"], self.LANG["remotescheme.not_all_params_filled.text"]]) self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.visible = "0" self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.height = "18" self.CONTAINER_REMOTE.height = self.FORM_REMOTE.height = "285" self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_test_sso.top = \ self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_apply.top = \ self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_reset.top = \ self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_test.top = "228" self.localization() self._correct_flag = False def render_proadmin_container(self): scheme = ProAdmin.scheme() app = ProAdmin.application() if scheme.is_remote(): scheme.touch() sync_time = scheme.sync_datetime.strftime("%H:%M:%S %d.%m.%Y") if scheme.sync_datetime else "?" sync_activate = "OK" if scheme.is_sync_active() else "FAIL" self.CONTAINER_PROADMIN.text_last_sync.value = "%s: %s"%(self.LANG["remotescheme.last_sync"], sync_time) self.CONTAINER_PROADMIN.text_sync_status.value = "%s: %s"%(self.LANG["remotescheme.sync_state"], sync_activate) self.CONTAINER_PROADMIN.text_objects.value = "%s: %s"%(self.LANG["remotescheme.objects"], len(app.child_objects(recursive=True))) self.CONTAINER_PROADMIN.text_users.value = "%s: %s"%(self.LANG["remotescheme.users"], len(app.get_users())) def render_remote_container(self, host, login, password): response.shared_variables["password"] = password connection_to_ip = self._check_ping(host) open_session = self._open_session(host, login, password) proadmin_version = self._check_proadmin(host, login, password) host_name = login + self.LANG["remotescheme.host_at"] + host host_name_to_show = host_name[:30] + "..." if len(host_name) > 30 else host_name self.REMOTE_SCHEME_CONTENT.hpt_host.htmlcode = "%s"%(host_name, host_name_to_show) self.REMOTE_SCHEME_CONTENT.hpt_conn.htmlcode = connection_to_ip + open_session + proadmin_version self.CONTAINER_LOCAL_STATE.classname += ' hide' self.CONTAINER_REMOTE.classname += ' hide' self.render_proadmin_container() def render_local_container(self, host, login, password): self.check_fields(host, login, password) if self._correct_flag: host = host.replace("https://", "").replace("http://", "").replace("/", "") connection_to_ip = open_session = proadmin_version = "" connection_to_ip = self._check_ping(host) open_session = self._open_session(host, login, password) proadmin_version = self._check_proadmin(host, login, password) self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.htmlcode = connection_to_ip + open_session + proadmin_version self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.visible = "1" self.FORM_REMOTE.hpt_conn.height = "110" self.CONTAINER_REMOTE.height = self.FORM_REMOTE.height = "385" self.FORM_REMOTE.formtext_host.value = host or "" self.FORM_REMOTE.formtext_login.value = login or "" self.FORM_REMOTE.formpassword.value = '*' * len(password) or "" self.localization() def render(self): remote = RemoteSettings.get_remote_setting() if remote: self.render_remote_container(remote.server, remote.login, remote.password) else: self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE.classname += ' hide' self.localization() def localization(self): self.CONTAINER_LOCAL_STATE.current_scheme_label.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.currentscheme.title"] self.CONTAINER_LOCAL_STATE.text_current_scheme.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.standalone.title"] self.FORM_REMOTE.sub_header.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.title"] self.FORM_REMOTE.text_host.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.proadmin.host"] self.FORM_REMOTE.text_login.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.proadmin.login"] self.FORM_REMOTE.text_password.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.proadmin.password"] self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_apply.label = self.LANG["form.buttons.apply"] self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_reset.label = self.LANG["form.buttons.reset"] self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_test_sso.label = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.proadmin.testsso"] self.FORM_REMOTE.btns_group.formbutton_test.label = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.proadmin.testconnection"] self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE.remote_scheme_header.current_scheme_label.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.currentscheme.title"] self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE.remote_scheme_header.text_current_scheme.value = self.LANG["remotescheme.selectscheme.proadmin.title"] self.REMOTE_SCHEME_CONTENT.sub_header.value = self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE.win_buttons.button_restart.text = self.LANG["remotescheme.remotescheme_state.restart"] self.CONTAINER_REMOTE_STATE.win_buttons.button_refresh.text = import ProAdmin import json from prosuite_localization import get_localization GROUP_MAX_LENGTH = 60 USER_NAME_MAX_LENGTH = 50 USER_LOGIN_MAX_LENGTH = 30 USER_GROUPS_MAX_LENGTH = 35 MAX_LENGTH_STRING_END = "..." class WidgetUserAndGroupDatatable: def __init__(self, current_tab, from_group_guid = None): self.__current_tab = current_tab self.__page = 0 self.users = self.groups = None self.__from_group_guid = from_group_guid if self.__current_tab == "users": if self.__from_group_guid and self.__from_group_guid != "all": groups = ProAdmin.application().get_groups(guid = self.__from_group_guid) self.users = groups[0].get_users() if groups else [] else: self.users = ProAdmin.application().get_users() else: self.groups = ProAdmin.application().get_groups() self.__is_user_name_sorted = \ self.__is_user_email_sorted = \ self.__is_group_name_sorted = False self.__sort_up = True self.__per_page = 10 def sort_by(self, field_name, asc): if field_name == "email": self.sort_by_user_email(asc) elif field_name == "fullname": self.sort_by_user_name(asc) elif field_name == "groupname": self.sort_by_group_name(asc) def sort_by_user_email(self, asc): self.__is_user_email_sorted = True self.users.sort(key=lambda x: x.email.lower()) if not asc: self.users = self.users[::-1] self.__sort_up = asc def sort_by_group_name(self, asc): self.__is_group_name_sorted = True self.groups.sort(key=lambda x: x.name.lower()) if not asc: self.groups = self.groups[::-1] self.__sort_up = asc def sort_by_user_name(self, asc): self.__is_user_name_sorted = True self.users.sort(key=lambda x: x.name.lower()) if not asc: self.users = self.users[::-1] self.__sort_up = asc def set_page(self,page): self.__page = page - 1 def set_objects_per_page(self, count): self.__per_page = count #after def render(self, datatable, pager=None, error_text=None): lang = get_localization() pages_count = 0 data = [] header = [] objects = None get_row = None edit_template = u"""
""" % (lang["form.buttons.edit"], "%s") # err_text = "" if self.__current_tab == "users": # users objects = self.users err_text = "no_users_text" def get_groups(user): result, l, endl = [], 0, None for group in user.get_groups(): result.append(group.name) l += len(group.name) if l > USER_GROUPS_MAX_LENGTH: endl = MAX_LENGTH_STRING_END break return (", ".join(result)[:USER_GROUPS_MAX_LENGTH] + endl) if endl else ", ".join(result) get_row = lambda user: [user.email[:USER_LOGIN_MAX_LENGTH]+MAX_LENGTH_STRING_END if len(user.email) > USER_LOGIN_MAX_LENGTH else user.email , user.name[:USER_NAME_MAX_LENGTH]+MAX_LENGTH_STRING_END if len(user.name) > USER_NAME_MAX_LENGTH else user.name, get_groups(user) ] h_email = "%s" % (lang.get('ug.userstable.header.login')) h_fullname = "%s" % (lang.get('ug.userstable.header.fullname')) h_groups = "%s" % (lang.get('ug.userstable.header.group')) # adding 'sort' arrow if needed if self.__is_user_email_sorted: if self.__sort_up: h_email += " " else: h_email += " " elif self.__is_user_name_sorted: if self.__sort_up: h_fullname += " " else: h_fullname += " " header = ["id", "edit", h_email, h_fullname, h_groups] else: # groups objects = self.groups get_users = lambda group: len(group.get_users()) get_row = lambda group: [group.name[:GROUP_MAX_LENGTH]+MAX_LENGTH_STRING_END if len(group.name) > GROUP_MAX_LENGTH else group.name, get_users(group)] h_groupname = "%s" % (lang["ug.groupstable.header.group"]) h_user_count = "%s" % (lang['ug.groupstable.header.count']) if self.__is_group_name_sorted: if self.__sort_up: h_groupname += " " else: h_groupname += " " header = ["id", "edit", h_groupname, h_user_count] count = len(objects) # users count left = self.__page * self.__per_page # from - index right = left + self.__per_page if left + self.__per_page <= count else count # to - index pages_count = str(count/self.__per_page + 1)\ if count % self.__per_page > 0 \ else str(count/ self.__per_page)# number of pages for obj in objects[left:right]: data.append([ obj.guid, edit_template % obj.name] + get_row(obj)) datatable.key = "id" datatable.hiddenfields = json.dumps(["id"]) datatable.header = json.dumps(header) datatable.data = json.dumps(data) if data: pager.pagescount = pages_count pager.currentpage = self.__page+1 pager.top = str(237 + 38 * len(data) + 100) datatable.visible = pager.visible = "1" error_text.action("hide") else: datatable.action("hide") pager.action("hide") if err_text: error_text.action("show") error_text.action("setText", [lang.get(err_text, lang["error.title"])]) # TODO: detect errors and add them to localization else: error_text.action("hide")

dropdown.selectedvalue = selected if selected else "all" dropdown.value = json.dumps( data_dict ) #
